The meaning of the configure options:

listitem.para: This ensures that the configure script finds the Tcl installation in the temporary tools location instead of possibly locating an existing one on the host system.
This tells the configure script not to search for Tk (the Tcl GUI component) or the X Window System libraries, both of which may reside on the host system.

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: make test. Note that the Expect test suite is known to experience failures under certain host conditions that are not within our control. Therefore, test suite failures here are not surprising and are not considered critical.
